max_generations.description: The maximum number of generations for the genetic algorithm.

pop_size.description: Size of the population in the genetic algorithm.

num_genes.description: Number of genes in a chromosome when using fixed number of genes per chromosome. Use -1 to disable this option.

min_num_genes.description: Minimum number of genes in a chromosome.

max_num_genes.description: Maximum number of genes in a chromosome.

stack.description: If True, the frequency bands are stacked, else there are combined.

lambda_1.description: Weight of the accuracy metric in the fitness function.

lambda_2.description: Weight of the number of parameters in the fitness function.

max_position.description: Maximum position value for genes. Use -1 to set the spectrogram height as the maximum position.

band_height.description: Set a fixed height for the band. Use -1 for different sizing.

mutation_rate.description: Mutation rate in the genetic algorithm.

crossover_rate.description: Crossover rate in the genetic algorithm.

reproduction_rate.description: Reproduction rate in the genetic algorithm.

tournament_size.description: The size of the tournament in the selection operator.

keep_in_memory.description: Flag to keep the dataset in memory.

reshuffle.description: Wheter or not to reshuffle the datafiles used for training/testing/validating.

train_size.description: Proportion of data used for training.

test_size.description: Proportion of data used for testing. Validation size will be the rest.

sample_rate.description: recording frequency of the audio files.

lowpass_cutoff.description: Lowpass cutoff frequency for audio preprocessing.

n_fft.description: Number of FFT points for audio processing.

f_min_chromosome.description: Minimum spectrogram frequency to display for the chromosome when no preprocessing is applied.

f_max_chromosome.description: Maximum spectrogram frequency to display for the chromosome when no preprocessing is applied.

optimizer_name.description: Name of the optimizer used for training the model.

loss_function_name.description: Name of the loss function used for training the model.

num_epochs.description: Number of training epochs for the model.

learning_rate.description: Learning rate used for training the model.

shuffle.description: Flag indicating whether to shuffle data during training.

metric.description: Metric used to evaluate model performance. Currently supported f1 and accuracy.

conv_filters.description: Number of filters in each convolutional layer

conv_kernel.description: kernel size of the convolutional filters

max_pooling_size.description: size of the max pooling operation

fc_units.description: number of neurons in the fully-connected layer(s)

fc_layers.description: number of fully-connected layer(s) excluding the output layer
